channel.title: Simplicity is a form of art... - seunshare

item.title: We do not ship SELinux sandbox
item.description: A few days ago a vulnerability was reported in the SELinux sandbox user space utility. The utility is part of the policycoreutils package. Luckily, Gentoo's sys-apps/policycoreutils package is not vulnerable - and not because we were clairvoyant about this issue, but because we don't ship this utility.
item.dc:creator: Sven Vermeulen

item.title: Dropping sesandbox support
item.description:
A vulnerability in seunshare, part of policycoreutils, came to light recently (through bug 509896). The issue is within libcap-ng actually, but the specific situation in which the vulnerability can be exploited is only available in seunshare.
